title: (x) Death Cab for Cutie "Direction To Plans" - Futura {Stephen}
author: beicke

comments.content: Possibly [Futura Medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20060222165136/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=EF.1073.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=DIRECTIONS+COMPANION&sampleSize=24) with some artificial bolding on DIRECTIONS TO PLANS.
Naw, that N looks normal. I’m with Stephen on that one — possibly bolded, or some Photoshop anti-aliasing action.
